title: Building a High-Concurrency Booking System with DynamoDB and AWS Fargate
excerpt: Learn how to architect and implement a scalable booking system that handles millions of concurrent requests using AWS DynamoDB and Fargate.
author: Deepak Pandey
summary: A deep dive into building production-ready booking systems that can handle massive concurrent loads using modern AWS services.

title: RAG + MCP: Wiring GenAI Tools into Real Applications
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to integrating Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Model Context Protocol for production-ready GenAI applications.
author: Deepak Pandey
summary: Explore how to combine RAG with Model Context Protocol to build intelligent applications that can access and reason over your data.

title: Self-Hosted vs Public LLM Providers: A Practical Setup Guide
excerpt: Compare the pros and cons of self-hosted LLMs versus public providers, with practical implementation examples using Ollama and AWS Bedrock.
author: Deepak Pandey
summary: A practical comparison of self-hosted vs cloud LLM solutions with real-world implementation guides and cost analysis.

title: Building Reactive Angular Applications with RxJS and NgRx
excerpt: Master reactive programming patterns in Angular using RxJS operators and NgRx state management for complex enterprise applications.
author: Deepak Pandey
summary: Learn advanced reactive programming patterns in Angular with practical examples of RxJS operators and NgRx state management.

title: Microservices Event-Driven Architecture with Apache Kafka
excerpt: Design and implement event-driven microservices using Apache Kafka for reliable, scalable distributed systems.
author: Deepak Pandey
summary: Comprehensive guide to building event-driven microservices architecture using Apache Kafka for enterprise-scale applications.
